subject: Re: Unusual email activity on site - nuplusmulti

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hi WP Perk team,

This is a follow-up to our original communication regarding the outbound email notifications from your website nuplasgroup.com.au being temporarily suspended. This was suspended due to high number of emails sent from your site, possibly due to abusive registration and fraudulent orders on your unprotected WooCommerce site.

Subjects

21 Subject: =?us-ascii?Q?Your_Nuplas_Apiarist_Supplies_|_Australia_order?= =?us-ascii?Q?_has_been_received!?= 
      7 Subject: =?us-ascii?Q?Your_Nuplas_Apiarist_Supplies_|_Australia_order?= =?us-ascii?Q?_is_now_complete?= 
      4 Subject: =?us-ascii?Q?Your_Nuplas_Apiarist_Supplies_|_Australia_accou?= =?us-ascii?Q?nt_has_been_created!?= 
      3 Subject: =?us-ascii?Q?Product_Catalogue_Request_Form_submitted_on_Nup?= =?us-ascii?Q?las_Apiarist_Supplies_|_Australia?= 
      3 Subject: =?us-ascii?Q?Contact_Us_Form_submitted_on_Nuplas_Apiarist_Su?= =?us-ascii?Q?pplies_|_Australia?= 
      1 Subject: =?us-ascii?Q?[Nuplas_Apiarist_Supplies_|_Australia]:_Order_#?= =?us-ascii?Q?22645_has_failed?= 
      1 Subject: =?us-ascii?Q?[Nuplas_Apiarist_Supplies_|_Australia]:_Order_#?= =?us-ascii?Q?22644_has_failed?= 
      1 Subject: =?us-ascii?Q?[Nuplas_Apiarist_Supplies_|_Australia]:_Order_#?= =?us-ascii?Q?22643_has_failed?= 
      1 Subject: =?us-ascii?Q?[Nuplas_Apiarist_Supplies_|_Australia]:_Order_#?= =?us-ascii?Q?22642_has_failed?= ﻿﻿Please note that as stated on our Transactional Email Policy, we reserve the right to temporarily disable any website outbound email notifications until the issue is resolved. We realize this is an inconvenience; however, due to the severity of the situation, you must take the steps previously outlined.

Along with 9319 more emails in the queue.

Logs

      4 54.191.137.17 "/wp-load.php" POST 200 "https://nuplasgroup.com.au/wp-load.php"

Automated activities by spam bots, or scammers on your site can be mitigated by configuring captcha, even on WooCommerce activities, on top of the usual web forms such as contact form, or comments. Please checkout our article here, https://kinsta.com/blog/wordpress-captcha/, and also a few plugins such as reCaptcha by BestWebSoft and Login no captcha reCAPTCHA to protect your forms, such as login, registration, and WooCommerce pages.﻿


﻿If you have any questions, don't hesitate to reach out! We're happy to help you find a suitable solution or offer guidance on any issues.

It is important to note that if we do not hear back from you, the outbound email notifications service could remain suspended indefinitely.
﻿
﻿Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter, we look forward to your feedback.
﻿
﻿Farhan | Malware & Abuse Engineer

Kinsta
Farhan from Kinsta
On Sun, Sep 4, 2022 at 06:34 AM, "Andrew Daniel" <andrew.daniel@kinsta.intercom-mail.com> wrote:

Hello,

We have systems in place that monitor outgoing emails. Our systems have detected an unusually high level of outgoing email from your site: nuplusmulti.

Upon investigation, we discovered a large number of order failure emails are being sent. This indicates there might be automated/bot order attempts being made on the site. To help ensure that automated/bot order attempts no longer occur it is highly recommended that you install and configure an anti-spam system such as reCAPTCHA. Below, you may find a link to our blog that goes int o details about how to install and configure reCAPTCHA:

https://kinsta.com/blog/wordpress-captcha/

Please note that our email sending service is only designed to handle routine transactional email such as password reset emails and new user confirmations within the limits described in our Terms of Service.

The email sent by this site does not appear to comply with our policy regarding transactional email. As such, we would ask that you set up your own email service - such as Mailgun, Sendgrid, or Mailjet - to handle your outgoing email or switch to using a third-party email marketing platform.

You can learn more about both of these options in our article Email Marketing Software Recommendations (Why Not to Use Your Host).

At this time, your site's ability to send email has been stopped.

Until the issue is resolved and the requirements set forth are satisfied, no email will be sent from your site through our third-party transactional service.

In most cases, we recommend that setting up a separate service will ensure the best possible deliverability of your outgoing email and ensure this action is not triggered on our platform.

Let us know if you have any questions!

Andrew D.

Kinsta | Support Lead Americas
